Helmin J. Caba, Mayor

Alerts5

### Hailey V. Cruz Batista, Council Member

![image](https://cdnsm5-hosted.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_11204924/Image/Council/2023/CM_Haily%20Cruz.png "image")  
A proud graduate of the Perth Amboy Public School System, Hailey Cruz Batista represents the future of the City of Perth Amboy. Born and raised in Perth Amboy, Hailey is a well-known educational professional in the school system, serving as a School Counselor at the Dual Language School and receiving the 2020-2021 Governor Educator of the Year Award. As a passionate supporter of educational policy, Hailey brought her talent as Valedictorian of her class at Kean University to Perth Amboy, where she earned her master’s degree in School Counseling, had the opportunity to teach English abroad to students in Wenzhou, China, and is currently pursuing her Doctorate.  
  
Looking to get more involved in the community, Hailey previously served as a member of the Perth Amboy County Committee and the Zoning Board of Adjustment and Planning Board Recording Secretary, where she focuses on ensuring innovative development. Moreover, Hailey is a proud American Federation of Teacher Union member and an AFL-CIO Labor Candidate School program graduate.

### Historic City of Perth Amboy

Perth Amboy, an urban community with a rich cultural history and a more than 300 year old maritime and industrial legacy. The City comprises a land area of 4.55 square miles with a population of 50,814 according to the 2010 Census.

### City Hall

260 High Street, Perth Amboy, NJ 08861  
[Open Map >](https://goo.gl/maps/3zSt52DLcK72)  
Phone: (732) 826-0290  
Hours: Mon-Fri 9:00 A.M-5:00 P.M

Alerts

New Call for Artists: Black History Month Exhibit

**Call for Artists: Black History Month Exhibit**  
The Perth Amboy Gallery Center for the Arts is now accepting artist submissions for the upcoming Black History Month Exhibit. Artists working in all visual art disciplines are encouraged to apply.  
**Application deadline: January 31.**

Apply here:  
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf9SXITMTwR06Nd4wd5CYLpRwzNtQbmMKow-zJJnzDntmJCCA/viewform>

Exhibit details and guidelines:  
<https://www.perthamboynj.org/community/news/announcements/call_for_artists___black_history_month_exhibit>

New UEZ Forgivable Loan Program for Small Business

**UEZ Forgivable Loan Program for Small Business**

The City of Perth Amboy’s Urban Enterprise Zone Forgivable Loan Program **application opens on Thursday, January 22, 2026, at 10:00 a.m.,** providing up to **$50,000**in financial assistance to eligible small businesses. IMPORTANT: Applications will be reviewed on a first-come, first-served basis, and while funds are available.

Business owners can:

* **Learn more about the loan program and prepare apply on January 22nd:**  
  <https://www.perthamboynj.org/cms/One.aspx?portalId=11205008&pageId=21144164>
* **Watch the recorded webinar in preparation for the application opening:**  
  <https://youtu.be/5MYWMYh1S-4>
* **Learn more about the UEZ program:**  
  <https://www.perthamboynj.org/cms/One.aspx?portalId=11205008&pageId=12071488>

New Safe Housing Grant Available for Seniors

**Safe Housing Grant Available for Seniors**

Perth Amboy homeowners age 60 and older may qualify for up to **$2,000** in essential home safety repairs through the Residential Maintenance Safe Housing Grant.

Applications are available at the **Alexander F. Jankowski Community Center, Office on Aging, 1 Olive Street, 1st Floor**. Applications are accepted while funds are available.

[Learn more and view program details](https://www.perthamboynj.org/cms/One.aspx?portalId=11205008&pageId=12072871)

New 2026 Garbage Collection Holiday Schedule

The 2026 Garbage Collection Holiday Schedule (No Service Days) is now available.
[Download here]([INSERT LINK]).

New Temporary Pause on Online Payments

### **Notice: Temporary Pause on Online Payments**

Online payment services for City accounts are temporarily unavailable due to a scheduled system update.

Online payments are expected to resume on **January 17, 2026**.

We appreciate your patience and understanding. For questions, please contact the Tax & Water Department.

---

### **Aviso: Suspensión Temporal de Pagos en Línea**

Los servicios de pago en línea para cuentas de la Ciudad no están disponibles temporalmente debido a una actualización programada del sistema.

Se espera que los pagos en línea se reanuden el **17 de enero de 2026**.

Agradecemos su paciencia y comprensión. Para preguntas, comuníquese con el Departamento de Impuestos y Agua.
